meanings.definition: The state or quality of being obsessive.
meanings.sent1: Her obsessivenesses with cleanliness led her to scrub the floors every day.
meanings.sent2: His obsessivenesses about punctuality made him always arrive early for meetings.
meanings.sent3: Her obsessivenesses with organizing her desk reached new heights when she color-coded her pens.
meanings.sent4: His obsessivenesses with winning was like a fire burning inside him, driving him to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The obsessivenesses of the detective in solving the case made him unstoppable.

meanings.definition: An excessive preoccupation with a particular subject or issue.
meanings.sent1: The obsessivenesses of the fans over the celebrity's personal life was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: Her obsessivenesses with fashion trends made her the go-to person for style advice.
meanings.sent3: The obsessivenesses of the cat over chasing laser pointers provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: His obsessivenesses with finding the perfect gift for his girlfriend was like a quest for treasure.
meanings.sent5: The obsessivenesses of the student with getting straight A's was admirable but exhausting.
